org.mokai.persist.jdbc
Class JdbcHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.mokai.persist.jdbc.JdbcHelper

public final class JdbcHelper
extends Object

Helper methods used by the JdbcMessageStore and other MessageStore implementations based on JDBC.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Detail

checkCreateTable

public static void checkCreateTable(DataSource dataSource,
                                    String schema,
                                    String tableName,
                                    String creationScript)
                             throws SQLException
Checks if the table exists. If it doesn't, it creates it using the supplied script.

Parameters:
dataSource - the DataSource used to create the connection.
schema - usually the database name, but can be null.
tableName - the name of the table to create.
creationScript - the script to create the exception
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong.

retrieveGeneratedId

public static long retrieveGeneratedId(Statement stmt)
                                throws SQLException
Helper method to retrieve the generated id after an insert.

Parameters:
stmt - the statement used in the insert.
Returns:
the generated id.
Throws:
SQLException - if something goes wrong
